page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF DIPTON.
page.content: In our block,the vast majority of the population live in DIPTON.The village of Dipton is 4 miles N.E.of Consett & is part of the District known as DERWENTSIDE.It is a long, straggling place, on the Northern slope of PONTOP PIKE,1,035ft.above sea-level,the highest point in the area. { Since 1955,the PIKE,as it is known {locally,has been the home of 2 {different T.V.Transmitters.The new {mast which was erected in 1984, is {500ft high,making the PIKE a local {landmark,for miles around.} At one time, there were 8 pits or collieries, in and around Dipton.Alas, they are all worked out.Unemployment is very high in Derwentside,over 25% There are no Industrial Estates in our block. { RESEARCH......by VICTORIA MC DERMOTT, {AND MARK OXNARD.
